name: Butterfly Nectar (Very short demo with placement art)
name_original: Butterfly Nectar (Very short demo with placement art)
description: Hello! Welcome to Butterfly Nectar, A LGBTQ+ dating sim! This is really just a past time for me, So I'll update sometimes! Most of the pictures in the game are just placeholders. This is also a very short demo to see if people are interested in it. Enjoy! (If you are interested in contributing or helping, please message me on discord at Angie💛#6023)
